title: Monty Python: Live at the Hollywood Bowl
brief_description: The Monty Python team perform some of their best sketches live to an American audience. John Cleese performs his silly walk, Eric Idle and Terry Jones feature in the infamous “Nudge, Nudge, Wink, Wink” skit, John Cleese appears in drag as an ice-cream vendor in Albatross” and the finale, “The Lumberjack song.
